131.content:
Ichigo was on the beach when he saw Yoruichi.

"Hey Ichigo." Yoruichi said as she smiled and waved at him.

"Yoruichi, how can I see you. Oh wait, a gigai." Ichigo said.

"Yeah, so would you like to regain your powers?" Yoruichi said.

"Sure, I would want them back. Please teach me." Ichigo said.

"Since nobody is here, we can start. Just follow my lead." Yoruichi said as she put her hands in a formation.

Ichigo followed Yoruichi's commands.

"Like this?" Ichigo said.

"Yeah, like that."

141.content:
"Halibel what are you doing here?" Ichigo asked.

"Hello there Ichigo. You see I was thinking that it have been a while since I had some Espadas that I can talk to and well I decided to form new Espadas and you were the first I have thought. However..."

"However what?" Ichigo said without realizing yet on what Halibel said next.

"Well I wanted my new Espadas to be females. Luckily we found a more improved Hogyoku that can not only turn anyone into Arrancars but even make it so that males become females."

"Wait a minute you made me a girl?!" Ichigo said in shock.

Halibel was laughing at Ichigo's new gender. "Well of course. Look behind you." Halibel said as Ichigo turned around to see a mirror.

Ichigo looked at her new body and was amazed at her look. She had long orange hair with breasts that can rival Rangiku and Yoruichi. Her mask fragments was on the right side that looked like half was red with white tips. The rest of her body Ichigo sees bits of her blade in an armor form like with Halibel. She looked to her back as she sees her new resurreccion sword in a sash so similar to when she or rather when he first went to the Soul Society to rescue Rukia.

The last thing she notice is that she has the number 1 below her belly button.

"So what do you think?" Halibel asked.

"What do I think, it's fantastic!" Ichigo said.

"Woah, I didn't expect a response like that."

"Well it will be fun. Does that mean I can have sex with you and the other Espada sisters?" Ichigo asked.

"Yes." Halibel said.

"Lets go then and call me Ichika." Ichika said as she slapped Halibel's butt.

15532.content:
The story belonged to Genma Soldier but everything else is owned by me.

Yoruichi grinned as she pushed back her oak chair. Two years of calm after the imprisonment of Aizen & an approval to move back into her clan's empty house proved a task for Yoruichi, especially being alone. But her plan had connected itself from her sinister thoughts. If she wanted to continue her legacy, it needed to be repopulated. Yet souls could not reproduce.

"I had tries through gigai...but it seems Kumabachi is the only option..." The ebony skinned soul thought to herself as she progressed downstairs. It was once a training room for the Shihoin household before her clan decided to use the vast space for their last forbidden project. Kumabachi. In the center of the room was six foot rectangular oak box, painted with red kanji and golden hoops from either side where the binds would come and go from.

"I see Gotei 13 really are careless...This isn't a crime, really. It's about for once getting what I want. My clan back!" She said out loud as Yoruichi stepped towards the object in the middle of the room. With her left index finger, the shinigami wiped a line of dust from the forbidden device. It seems it had not been touched since the Shihoin house was closed.

"Father, you always were a curious man. Always looking to do the greater good for Soul Society, even if it meant turning convicted shinigami into harmless females or recycle their uses, as long as they avoided Yamamotos execution hill..." Yoruichi gave a toothy grin as she grabbed the device and flash-stepped away with it, within the blink of an eye. Leaving nothing but a rectangular area on the mahogany floor where dust would later gather. Until the Shihoin was repopulated, that was...

Yoruichi blinked slowly as the gates closed behind her. The human world, her first time in two years of being here once more. Yet she was so used to living in exile that Karakura Town was known like the back of her hand.

"But who can I choose that Soul Society can't possibly punish me for?..." The busty beauty grinned as her purple eyes flashed around the streets. Just then she noticed the Kurosaki clinic...perfect. A shinigami that wasn't officially registered. Just what Shihoin house needed

"Father, you always were a curious man. Always looking to do the greater good for Soul Society, even if it meant turning convicted shinigami into harmless females or recycle their uses, as long as they avoided Yamamotos execution hill..." Yoruichi gave a toothy grin as she grabbed the device and flash-stepped away with it, within the blink of an eye. Leaving nothing but a rectangular area on the mahogany floor where dust would later gather. Until the Shihoin was repopulated, that was...

Yoruichi blinked slowly as the gates closed behind her. The human world, her first time in two years of being here once more. Yet she was so used to living in exile that Karakura Town was known like the back of her hand.

"But who can I choose that Soul Society can't possibly punish me for?..." The busty beauty grinned as her purple eyes flashed around the streets. Just then she noticed the Kurosaki clinic...perfect. A shinigami that wasn't officially registered. Just what Shihoin house needed.
15532.title: The sisterhood of the Shihoin

155321.content:
Ichigo groaned as he tossed and turned in his sleep, the strawberry blonde teenager grunted as his ribs ached. Surely the last time he'd be Tatsuki's new training partner at the dojo she practiced at. He was so puffed out he didn't get changed from his sweat stained white gi that the saviour of Soul Society passed out as soon as he hit the cotton bedsheets.

The Kurosaki family's eldest child had been powerless for two years now after sacraficing it to put an end to Aizen's quest for complete power. Instead due to his keen reflexes and above normal ability in fitness, Ichigo had been making small sums of money by playing for sports teams. An ordinary life at last?

"Awww, sound asleep. Well at this time of the morning I'd never expect a lazy bastard like you to get up regardless" Yoruichi sighed quietly as the beautiful, yet centuries old Soul flash-stepped through the open window Ichigo had left to keep cool.

Yoruichi was rather surprised that the looming shadow of the Kumabachi didn't awaken or alert Kurosaki's senses, instead he merely turned in his sleep. Casting a kido to make the room soundproof, Shihoin set to her work. Her purple hair blew with the breeze as she knelt down on one knee and pulled a wooden switch outwards. Gently & slowly, the red kanji symbols began to light up as Ichigo stirred from his slumber.

"Hey? What the hell is this. Orihime, I don't want anymore house decorations. I told you this..." Kurosaki Ichigo grumbled, his eyes squinting at the rectangular coffin-like box that towered above him.

"Not exactly a house gift, Ichigo, but consider it a great gift from me to you!" Yoruichi cackled as five thick black ropes shout out from their golden hooplets. Icihigo flinched as the first rope pulled his right hand after it wrapped it.

"WHAT THE-" Was all the teenager could say, not that he could do much anyway due to his loss of power.

The second rope snaked itself between Ichigo's legs and ensared his torso from behind, allowing the third to immobilze his left hand.

"Three ropes? I thought you would have required all!" Shihoin giggled, her hourglass figure standing confidently beside her device. Her eyes fixated on Ichigo's body squirming as the ropes contracted themselves back into the Kumabachi, along with Ichigo's white gi'd baggy figure. Silence.

"I can't believe it is finally happening, Shihoin honour will be restored in a matter of months..." Yoruichi's cat-like features smiled darkly as the Kumabachi set to work, letting off a pale white smoke as Ichigo kicked and bounced from the insides to get out.

"No what's that, what is this fume? Ah...my voice!" Kurosaki let out a high pitch squeal. It seemed his body was already taking to the Kumabachi smog, extracted from hot springs Yoruichi's uncle had found outside the confines of Soul Society. It was his uncle's son that found out the hard way what the hot springs contained however. As his once proud son emerged as a beautiful young woman.

"It's alright Ichigo, you don't have to stay that silent! I've Kido'd the room. As far as Isshin & your family are concerned you're out for the count after your hard day out!" Yoruichi chuckled! Slapping the side of the oak structure, vibrating the shell slightly.

Fifteen minutes had passed and Yoruichi stood patiently in front of Kumabachi's lid. Fifteen long minutes of high pitch begging & steam emerging from her family's device.

Finally it opened, the oak lid swung open, the firey red kanji faded back to a calmer, cooler color. From the white smog, Yoruichi could see a busty figure with long hair and slim legs.

"Ughhh...." The gentle whimper said as she stepped forward. The white gi had been forced outwards from the new bust Ichigo had obtained. the V of her attire had expanded largely, revealing a large portion of breast. Ichigo's skin had darkened to a caramel-like tone similar to Yoruichi's except a bit lighter. Her long strawberry blonde haire was shaggy and long and her cheek bones were defined.

"Ohhh, who am I?" Was all the transformed Kurosaki said as she rubbed her head. Yoruichi grinned darkly, father's creation had worked.

"You are Ichiya Shihoin, my younger sister. I've been looking for you!" In a faux tone, Yoruichi deceived the teenager who now had no clue and would believe the first thing she was told for the sake of something to confide in.

"Ohhh! Thank you, where have you been...Yoruichi, right?" A distant memory brought the Shihoin's name to Ichiya's head. Yoruichi nodded and closed her eyes and explained the war of Aizen that had seperated them. Ichiya couldn't have been any more gullible or happier.

"Hoiii!" Ichiya Shihoin concluded. Now with fake memories, Yoruichi's new task was to ditch the sweat-stained white gi. As much as it revealed what she wanted, the clan prided itself in attire. Giving Ichiya a sleeveless attire much like the 2nd division, her new sister could but only smile and get changed. At last, the first clan member had been restored!
155321.title: The birth of Ichiya Shihoin
